attributes.action: Change the law around cats being hit by motor vehicles. Drivers must report it.
attributes.additional_details: Because it is wildly unfair, distressing and morally wrong to not report the killing of a loved pet.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Require drivers to stop and take cats to the vets if they hit them in their car
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/728011
